A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Far from the SW universe is this movie. Disney and Rian Johnson (a nobody director truth be told) have really taken to destroying the legend that SW was presenting to the world. This movie was almost Spaceballs in comparison with many scenes taken from other movies showcasing the directors lack of originality. Nothing in this movie was believable and the so called comedic lines was Disney all over a la Nickelodeon. Just rubbish......
